item.title: [HELP] How do i add a auto talker to my client?
item.dc:creator: @PDPK PDPK
item.description:
@PDPK wrote:

I would like to add a auto talker to my client & a button on Jframe

I [color=limegreen]leeched[/color] this from a client that had command auto talker but not sure if its any good
i dont know where to put them bits to to find out if it works.

[code] public String autoTalk;
public int autoTimer;

    if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastScript > scriptAction && scriptN == 3)
    {
        forceChat(autoTalk, 2);
        scriptAction = autoTimer;
        lastScript = System.currentTimeMillis();
    }
    if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastScript > scriptAction && scriptN == 6)


    {
        forceChat((new StringBuilder()).append(scrambler).append("-").append(autoTalk).toString(), 2);
        scrambler++;
        scriptAction = autoTimer;
        lastScript = System.currentTimeMillis();
    }
    if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastScript > scriptAction && scriptN == 1)

    {

                    {
                        System.out.println((new StringBuilder()).append("Auto: ").append(s.substring(5)).toString());
                        autoTalk = s.substring(5);
                        scriptN = 3;
                    }
                } else
                if(s.startsWith("time"))
                {

public client()

    autoTalk = "- CC Autotalker -";
    autoTimer = 8000;[/code]

most probs wont work…
Any help pl0x?

I think i need bluurs help.
